reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Delivery of Emergency Nutritional Support in Vulnerable Areas of Sudan

description.narrative: Il programma mira a prevenire e curare la malnutrizione fornendo alimenti nutrienti specializzati ai bambini sotto i cinque anni e alle donne e ragazze in gravidanza e allattamento (PLWG) tra i rifugiati, gli sfollati interni e le comunità di accoglienza vulnerabili.Intende anche favorire l’accesso dei soggetti vulnerabili alle cure necessarie per la cura e la prevenzione della malnutrizione, e informare sui benefici dei vari programmi e sulle corrette pratiche alimentari e igienico-sanitarie.

The program aims to prevent and treat malnutrition by providing specialized nutritious foods to children under five and pregnant and breastfeeding women and girls, targeting refugees, internally displaced persons and vulnerable host communities. In addition to that, to favour the access of vulnerable people to the care necessary for the treatment and prevention of malnutrition and provide information on the benefits of the various programs and on correct food and sanitation practices.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
